item.title: 11 May 2021 19:19
item.description:
Tweaked this setup further to make it a bit more seamless. I used a different but more reliable script to fetch the activity json files and setup a cron job to run twice every week. Next-up: 01. Make the parsing and data display theme agnostic. 02. … https://t.co/V0C73ukHFC
